user_sentiment: neutral or positive - user initiated contact but provided no substantive direction
execution_quality: N/A - no work was requested or executed. Agent appropriately recognized this as a greeting and awaited further instructions.
work_category: Greeting/session initialization. User sent a simple greeting with no follow-up work or requests.
summary: User initiated session with a greeting but provided no follow-up instructions or task requests, resulting in immediate session termination. No work was performed, tools were not invoked, and the interaction concluded within 3 seconds. Perfect alignment since the agent correctly recognized the absence of actionable requests and did not attempt unnecessary work.
follow_up_pattern: User terminated session without providing any tasks. Suggests either exploratory contact, accidental session start, or decision to work without Claude.
